languages.text: "По-прежнему неизвестно, как дух корабля смог призвать силу Бога-Машины и активировать варп-двигатель. И все же во время медитативного ритуала Омниссия даровал мне не менее ценное откровение — священный дух, живущий в недрах корабельных механизмов, отличается от иных, подобных ему. Этому духу присуща особая мощь, которую нельзя назвать иначе, чем благословением Машинного Бога".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "По-прежнему неизвестно, как дух корабля смог призвать силу Бога-Машины и активировать варп-двигатель. И все же во время медитативного ритуала Омниссия даровал мне не менее ценное откровение — священный дух, живущий в недрах корабельных механизмов, отличается от иных, подобных ему. Этому духу присуща особая мощь, которую нельзя назвать иначе, чем благословением Машинного Бога".

languages.text: "How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."
languages.original_text: "По-прежнему неизвестно, как дух корабля смог призвать силу Бога-Машины и активировать варп-двигатель. И все же во время медитативного ритуала Омниссия даровал мне не менее ценное откровение — священный дух, живущий в недрах корабельных механизмов, отличается от иных, подобных ему. Этому духу присуща особая мощь, которую нельзя назвать иначе, чем благословением Машинного Бога".

traits.locale_text: "How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains unknown. Yet, during the meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms is different from other similar to him. This spirit has a special power that cannot be called anything other than the blessing of the Machine God."

"How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."

"How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."

"How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."

languages.text: « Nous ignorons toujours comment l'esprit du vaisseau est parvenu à emprunter le pouvoir du Dieu-Machine pour activer le moteur Warp. Toutefois, ma méditation rituelle m'a permis de recevoir une révélation non moins précieuse de l'Omnimessie : l'esprit sacré qui réside dans ses entrailles métalliques est différent des autres. Il détient un pouvoir unique qui n'est rien de moins qu'une bénédiction du Dieu-Machine lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ignorons toujours comment l'esprit du vaisseau est parvenu à emprunter le pouvoir du Dieu-Machine pour activer le moteur Warp. Toutefois, ma méditation rituelle m'a permis de recevoir une révélation non moins précieuse de l'Omnimessie : l'esprit sacré qui réside dans ses entrailles métalliques est différent des autres. Il détient un pouvoir unique qui n'est rien de moins qu'une bénédiction du Dieu-Machine lui-même. »

languages.text: “虚空舰的机魂究竟是如何呼唤万机之神的力量，启动亚空间驱动器，这依然是个未解之谜。然而，在我的冥想仪式中，欧姆尼塞亚赐予了我同样宝贵的启示——生活在这艘舰船内部机械装置中的神圣机魂，与其他类似形式的机魂并不相同。这里的机魂拥有某种独特的力量，可以称得上是万机之神的祝福。”
languages.original_text: "How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."

traits.locale_text: “虚空舰的机魂究竟是如何呼唤万机之神的力量，启动亚空间驱动器，这依然是个未解之谜。然而，在我的冥想仪式中，欧姆尼塞亚赐予了我同样宝贵的启示——生活在这艘舰船内部机械装置中的神圣机魂，与其他类似形式的机魂并不相同。这里的机魂拥有某种独特的力量，可以称得上是万机之神的祝福。”

languages.text: "Es ist nicht bekannt, wie der Geist des Raumschiffs die Macht des Maschinengotts anrufen und den Warpantrieb aktivieren konnte. Doch während meines meditativen Rituals hat der Omnissiah mir eine ebenso wertvolle Offenbarung gewährt: Der heilige Geist, der in den Mechanismen des Schiffs haust, unterscheidet sich von ähnlichen Formen. Dieser Geist besitzt eine einzigartige Kraft, die man nur als Segen des Maschinengotts bezeichnen kann."
languages.original_text: "How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist nicht bekannt, wie der Geist des Raumschiffs die Macht des Maschinengotts anrufen und den Warpantrieb aktivieren konnte. Doch während meines meditativen Rituals hat der Omnissiah mir eine ebenso wertvolle Offenbarung gewährt: Der heilige Geist, der in den Mechanismen des Schiffs haust, unterscheidet sich von ähnlichen Formen. Dieser Geist besitzt eine einzigartige Kraft, die man nur als Segen des Maschinengotts bezeichnen kann."

languages.text: «Seguimos sin comprender cómo el espíritu de la nave del vacío pudo invocar el poder del Dios Máquina y activar el motor de disformidad. Sin embargo, durante mi ritual meditativo, el Omnissiah me ofreció una revelación de igual importancia: el espíritu sagrado que reside en las entrañas de los mecanismos de esta nave es diferente a otros de su clase. La singularidad de este espíritu no es sino una bendición del Dios Máquina».
languages.original_text: "How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."

traits.locale_text: «Seguimos sin comprender cómo el espíritu de la nave del vacío pudo invocar el poder del Dios Máquina y activar el motor de disformidad. Sin embargo, durante mi ritual meditativo, el Omnissiah me ofreció una revelación de igual importancia: el espíritu sagrado que reside en las entrañas de los mecanismos de esta nave es diferente a otros de su clase. La singularidad de este espíritu no es sino una bendición del Dios Máquina».

languages.text: 「ヴォイドシップの精霊が機械神の力を呼び起こし、<歪み>航行を発動する方法は未だに謎だ。しかし、瞑想の儀式中に、万機神がそれに劣らぬ貴重な啓示を与えてくださった。船のシステムの内部に住む神聖なる精霊は、他の似た形態の精霊とは別物なのだ。この精霊は、機械神のご加護としか言いようのない特殊な力を持っている」
languages.original_text: "How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォイドシップの精霊が機械神の力を呼び起こし、<歪み>航行を発動する方法は未だに謎だ。しかし、瞑想の儀式中に、万機神がそれに劣らぬ貴重な啓示を与えてくださった。船のシステムの内部に住む神聖なる精霊は、他の似た形態の精霊とは別物なのだ。この精霊は、機械神のご加護としか言いようのない特殊な力を持っている」

languages.text: "Uçsuz gemisinin ruhunun nasıl oldu da Makine Tanrı'nın gücünü çağırdığı ve öteboyut motorunu faaliyete geçirdiği bilinmezliğini korumakta. Yine de meditasyon ayini sırasında Hermesih bana bir o kadar kıymetli bir aydınlanma bahşetti: Geminin mekanizmalarının içinde ikamet eden kutsal ruh, diğer kıyaslanabilir formlardan farklı. Bu ruh, Makine Tanrı'nın nimeti mertebesinde kabul edilebilecek eşsiz bir güç ihtiva etmekte."
languages.original_text: "How the spirit of the voidship was able to call upon the power of the Machine God and activate the warp drive remains an unknown. Yet, during my meditative ritual, the Omnissiah gave me an equally valuable revelation — the sacred spirit that lives in the bowels of the ship's mechanisms differs from other analogous forms. This spirit holds a unique power that cannot be called anything less than a blessing of the Machine God."
